name: Frisbee Bounce
description:
Frisbee Bounce is a variant game of the classic Pong developed by students of the 2nd Semester of the Game Design course at Anhembi Morumbi University.

The game is based on two dogs, a Shi-Tzu and a Dachshund, throwing a frisbee back and forth. It has two game modes, a single player mode where you play against an AI or a two player mode where each player controls one of the dogs.

Fun fact, the dogs are actually the dogs of the developers.
